FOOTER.message: Created and designed by Mathias Tanner

LOGIN.message: You should have recieved the link to this website by either Sarah or Mathias. To confirm your identiy, please enter your first and last name in the form below
LOGIN.wrongMessage: You don't seem to be on the list. Please check that you haven't made a type. If you have recieved the link for the website but it doesn't work, please contact Sarah or Mathias

ABOUT.date: Invitation to wedding reception â€“ Saturday 23rd July 2022
ABOUT.infos: We are getting married this summer, on Friday 22nd of July 2022. The ceremony itself will be small with only direct family, but we will have a larger wedding reception with family and friends on Saturday 23rd of July. We hope you can attend and celebrate with us.
ABOUT.place: The wedding reception will be held at Whitley Bay ice rink and will start at 16.00.
ABOUT.answerText: Please click on the button below to RSVP and send your song requests.
ABOUT.updates: We will post more information here closer to the date, so please check back later. We will also use the website as a platform to share photos and memories of the event, so it'll will stay online for quite some time.
